section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains information regarding the immunological state of the patient with respect to a given disease.

stentry.p: The date upon which a healthcare provider determined the immunological state of the Patient with respect to a given disease.
See Patient Immunity Category definition for values.
Categorizes the immunological state of the Patient with respect to a given disease. Possible values include: Susceptible; Equivocal; Immune; Currently Infected.
Evidence that the patient has already developed immunity to a particular disease.
"Identifies the condition or problem for which the drug/treatment was prescribed." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-20.
